body:
Currently logging is suppressed during queries and update validators because `isReplaying()` returns true. We should allow logging during these live read operations.

Related: temporalio/features#718

Reference implementations:
- Python: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-python/pull/1274
- .NET: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-dotnet/pull/594
- Ruby: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-ruby/pull/378
title: Allow logging in queries and update validators
